techacademy.Descriptiton: The world of business presents a variety of roles and opportunities, and with the advent of technology. Our range of courses includes Cyber Security, Big data & IoT, Cloud Computing, and Web Development; which will equip you with the required skills in the tech world.

webdev.techdescription: Frontend programming often develops interfaces through which the application interacts with users.
The backend code communicates with the server and distributes information or data to the users.
Full stack web developers can create full-fledged web applications and websites.

cloudcomputing.techtitle: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions
cloudcomputing.techdescription: This course provides the knowledge and skills to design and implement DevOps processes and practices.
This course teaches Solutions Architects how to translate business requirements into secure, scalable, and reliable solutions.
This course teaches Solutions Architects how to translate business requirements into secure, and reliable solutions.

cloudcomputing.techtitle: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions
cloudcomputing.techdescription: This course provides the knowledge and skills to design and implement DevOps processes and practices.

cloudcomputing.techtitle: Administering Relational Databases on Microsoft Azure
cloudcomputing.techdescription: This course provides students with the knowledge and skills to administer a SQL Server database infrastructure.

cybersecurity.techdescription: This course will introduce you to the cybersecurity and Information technology/security world of managing risks of projects.
This course introduces key processes, systems, and documentation used in security auditing for organizations.
This course introduces you to reverse engineering, the concepts, and tools used worldwide by professionals.
This course introduces you to identify vulnerabilities in networks, applications, and organizations' infrastructure.

bigdata.techdescription: This course is designed to provide foundational skills and knowledge prominently required across the emerging digitization technologies.

bigdata.techtitle: Programming Essentials in Python I & II
bigdata.techdescription: In this course, you'll gain the knowledge and skills to design, develop and improve multi-module computer application.
It develops foundational skills in the interdisciplinary domain of electronics, networking, security, data analytics, and business.
